LanguageData.AB_LavaPanicFlee.label: covered in lava
LanguageData.AB_LavaPanicFlee.beginLetter: {0} was splashed by lava and is fleeing in panic.
LanguageData.AB_LavaPanicFlee.recoveryMessage: {0} is no longer fleeing in panic.
LanguageData.AB_LavaPanicFlee.baseInspectLine: Mental state: Fleeing in panic due to contact with lava
